clickhouse.name: clickhouse-01
clickhouse.insert_logs_query: INSERT INTO logs (receive_time, services, source_host, remote_addr, body_bytes_sent, bytes_sent, request_time, status, request_uri, request_method, host, uri, hostname, http_referer, http_user_agent, upstream_response_time, upstream_host, upstream_cache_status, request_length, server_port, server_protocol, connection, connection_requests, isp) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
clickhouse.create_table_query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS default.logs (receive_time DateTime, services String, source_host String, remote_addr String, body_bytes_sent UInt64, bytes_sent UInt64, request_time Float64, status UInt16, request_uri String, request_method String, host String, uri String, hostname String, http_referer String, http_user_agent String, upstream_response_time Float64, upstream_host String, upstream_cache_status String, request_length UInt64, server_port UInt16, server_protocol String, connection UInt32, connection_requests UInt32, isp String) ENGINE = MergeTree ORDER BY receive_time SETTINGS index_granularity = 8192;
